title: Filter chips
summary: Filter chips allow users to narrow down the data they want to see on the page.
preamble: The filter chip lets users quickly narrow down visible content by selecting or removing specific filters. It helps refine results without navigating away from the page.
anatomy-details:
1.  Chips container
    
2.  Label text
    
3.  Trailing icon (selected)
    
4.  Icon button remove
    
5.  Leading icon
